newsitem.title: USA: Security files shelf for $600 mln debt/stock.
newsitem.headline: Security files shelf for $600 mln debt/stock.

text.p: Security Capital Industrial Trust said Friday it filed a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to $600 million in debt securities and preferred and common shares.
When combined with previous registrations, Security will have up to $677,988,613 in debt securities and stocks, the filing said.
Net proceeds will be used for the acquisition and development of additional industrial properties, as suitable opportunities arise, the company said.
Proceeds will also be used for the repayment of certain outstanding indebtedness at such time, for capital improvements to properties and for general corporate purposes, it said.
